original_text: ‘The Lord God of Israel is a great God. He has come to save his people. He has come to make them free. ‘The Lord God of Israel is a great God.
korean_text: 찬송하리로다 주 이스라엘의 하나님이여 그 백성을 돌보사 속량하시며

sentences.original_text: The Lord God of Israel is a great God
He has come to save his people
He has come to make them free
The Lord God of Israel is a great God
